thread.title: BRIEF-Blackstone Mortgage Trust Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Convertible Senior Notes

title: BRIEF-Blackstone Mortgage Trust Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Convertible Senior Notes
text: March 23, 2018 / 12:25 AM / Updated 32 minutes ago BRIEF-Blackstone Mortgage Trust Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Convertible Senior Notes Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - Blackstone Mortgage Trust Inc: * BLACKSTONE MORTGAGE TRUST ANNOUNCES PRICING OF PUBLIC OFFERING OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES * BLACKSTONE MORTGAGE TRUST ‍ANNOUNCED PRICING OF AN UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF $220 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF ITS 4.75% CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
